amendment.description: To adjust the normal and early retirement ages for Social Security benefits and increase the maximum age for delayed retirement credits.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3346, under the order of 12/20/2024, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 3 - 93. Record Vote Number: 333.

action.text: Amendment SA 3346 proposed by Senator Paul.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3346 proposed by Senator Paul.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3346, under the order of 12/20/2024, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 3 - 93. Record Vote Number: 333.
